name: Fast-paced multiplayer game prototype
description:
A simple fast-paced 2D top-down multiplayer game prototype.

Controls:

"W, A, S, D" to move the character.

Press "Enter" to send text chat in-game.

Go to Lobby -> Setting to enable chat voice (It doesn't work if you are "behind NAT").
